name: The Room: The Idiom Awareness Game
name_original: The Room: The Idiom Awareness Game
description:
I wove a web made of Twine, then threw in many idioms, and this is the result: a text-adventure game poking fun at the literal translations of idioms. Contains everything, including the kitchen sink and is guaranteed to knock your socks off.

Made in 48 hours in SUNJAM 2017 (Theme: "The Elephant In The Room") and will likely count as 1GAM for July.
